report.title: HORUS quality indices
report.description: List of selectable HORUS quality indices for a sample.
report.query: select #columns# from taxa_taxon_list_attributes ttla join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values ttlav on ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=ttla.id and ttlav.deleted=false join cache_occurrences o on o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id=ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_id where ttla.caption='quality indices' and o.sample_id=#sample_id# and ttla.deleted=false
